channel.title: whonix room not by default inside hexchat - whonix 14
channel.description:
as i remember that whonix room inside oftc was already attached to hexchat when u open it. u dont need to add it manually.But it has been disappeared as i can see.
so i wonder is that meant to happen or missed.

item.title: whonix room not by default inside hexchat - whonix 14
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
that i hope to be merged with hexchat firejail profiles.

item.title: whonix room not by default inside hexchat - whonix 14
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Never been the case. There is a desktop shortcut for Whonix IRC support though which automatically joins Whonix IRC support.

Read full topic
